user.getUserById: SELECT id, username, created_at as createdAt FROM security.users WHERE id = $1
user.getUserByUsername: SELECT id, username, created_at as createdAt FROM security.users WHERE username = $1
user.deleteUserById: DELETE FROM security.users WHERE id = $1 RETURNING *

auth.getAuthInfoById: SELECT id, email, password FROM security.auth_info WHERE id = $1
auth.getUserIdByAuthId: SELECT u.id as id FROM security.users as u JOIN security.auth as a ON u.id = a.user_id WHERE a.id = $1
auth.getAuthInfoByEmail: SELECT id, email, password, auth_id FROM security.auth_info WHERE email = $1
auth.getUserRoles: SELECT r.id as id, r.name as name FROM security.roles as r JOIN security.auth_roles as ar ON ar.role_id = r.id JOIN security.auth as a ON a.id = ar.auth_id WHERE a.id = $1

session.refreshSession: UPDATE security.active_sessions SET at_jti = (SELECT uuid_generate_v4()), rt_jti = (SELECT uuid_generate_v4()), active = true, expires_at = (SELECT NOW() + $1), updated_at = (SELECT NOW()), last_activity = (SELECT NOW()) RETURNING *
